en.TOP_01: MigrantCoin delivers money to your doorsteps
en.TOP_02: Blockchain-based decentralized money transfer powered by users.
en.TOP_03: The possibility to send money home straight from your virtual wallet is here.
en.HOWITWORKS_02: FASTER THAN EVER BEFORE, STRAIGHT TO THE RECIPIENT’S DOORSTEP.
en.HOWITWORKS_03: By using blockchain and the Stellar platform, remittances take a few minutes to reach their destination.
en.HOWITWORKS_04: The users only needs to sign in, deposit the amount they wants to send and choose the way to deliver it.
en.HOWITWORKS_05: The sender may opt for a bank account transfer, delivery to the door or a paypoint via which the money can reach the beneficiary.
en.HOWITWORKS_06: It takes a few simple steps:
en.HOWITWORKS_08: 2. Sign up to create an account.
en.HOWITWORKS_09: 3. Choose between a paypoint and a bank account (sender’s discretion) to purchase MGC.
en.HOWITWORKS_11: MigrantCoin will then quickly process the transaction and deliver the money to the beneficiary in person, by courier.
en.HOWITWORKS_12: The beneficiary will acknowledge the receipt of the money with an electronic signature.
en.HOWITWORKS_13: Lastly, the sender will receive a confirmation in the app that the money was delivered successfully.
en.MAP_02: Spends 128 days on commuting in their lifetime to send money to relatives
en.VISION_02: Spending money is easy, sending them should be the same.
en.VISION_03: Aiming for a shift in the core structure of our money remittance system, we also seek for a change in the way we engage and commit to one another.
en.VISION_04: As we stride towards the comprehensive use of blockchain technology, new prospects of establishing sustainable communities arise.
en.VISION_05: MigrantCoin is such an opportunity, tying the senders and receivers more reliably, owing to the very ease attached to the remittance process.
en.VISION_06: In other words, we aim for a revolution
en.VISION_07: In the end, the future belongs to those who are able to challenge the state-of-things, to believe that they can do more and improve.
en.VISION_08: (Im)migrants do just that: they strive for improvement and hoping for a more serene future.
en.VISION_09: We see ourselves moving towards the same ideals and making MigrantCoin available at a large scale, to any migrant who wants to use it.
en.VISION_10: This will meam the opportunity to obtain easy access (that would otherwise be very difficult) to user-friendly and secure remittance mechanisms.
en.TOKEN_02: A fixed number of tokens will be created for token sale. There will be no more tokens generated after that.
en.TOKEN_09: It is also possible to have a static supply with a dynamic funding goal, in which the distribution of tokens will be made according to the funds received
en.ROADMAP_06: Release of Alpha version with alpha customers and delivery businesses and banks
en.ROADMAP_10: Relase version 1 of platform (web and mobile)
en.ROADMAP_15: Security enforcement: penetration test by independent specialists
en.MISSION_02: To enable migrants to send money to a recipient in their home country safely through blockchain .
en.MISSION_04: Time is money and so much more, and we urge you to keep this in mind.
en.MISSION_05: A decentralized cryptocurrency remittance system will help people save precious hours they would otherwise waste on trips to the nearest bank or MTO.
en.MISSION_06: Our solution will enable you to avoid commuting just for the sake of sending and receiving money.
en.MISSION_08: The world we envisage is one in which people have undeterred, steady access to the methods by which they can send and receive money making them feel the money they send/pick up is safe.
en.MISSION_10: Many receive money via occasional delivering parties, which raises the risk of losing it.
en.MISSION_11: Even worse, the money may never reach its intended destination.
en.MISSION_12: MigrantCoin seeks to eliminate this risk, by its user-powered structure allowing the detection of any potential error in the process of sending and receiving a specific sum of money, owing to the ensuing transparency and security of the system.
en.VALUES_02: For more detail, click on each item.
en.VALUES_04: Change and innovation are needed if we want to advance. MigrantCoin looks at the money remittance market and finds that there is room for improvement.
en.VALUES_07: Our concept is being developed for migrants and those at home alike. We believe that our appreciation of the people will draw, their appreciation of our efforts. Without people, there would be no point for our struggle.
en.VALUES_10: Following a careful analysis of the remittance market, we concluded that, the solutions offered to the problems of this market are rather similar. MigrantCoin seeks to implement an unique solutions to these issues and we believe that we can make a difference.
en.VALUES_13: We believe that transparency in relation to the investors and our community is very important. We propose that all the amounts of money gathered in the ICO should be justified and we shall do our best to fulfill our commitments.
en.VALUES_14: We identify needs and satisfy them
en.VALUES_15: The MigrantCoin project is, first of all, the result of the desire to solve some of the needs of a specific category of people ((im)migrants) and, to make their lives easier.
en.VALUES_17: Our main concern is to guarantee the amounts of money entrusted to us for their delivery to the destination indicated by the client. Your trust is our success – and we aim for it.
en.VALUES_20: Conventional payment and money transfer systems cannot keep the pace with the human kind’s desire of quick and constant evolution. We are the result of the technological revolution and it is our duty to offer to the future generations the tools required for the same remittance of money, anywhere in the world, fast and risk-free.
en.VALUES_22: MigrantCoin is a project aiming to make its services available across the world. This is a very difficult and complex process we alone cannot complete. For this reason, you will be happy to know that, in the countries where we will offer our services, you too can become our partner.
en.TEAM_01: A strong team drawing on their broad experience
en.TEAM_02: Our wonderful team is ready to achieve lasting results.
en.FAQ_02: Frequently asked questions (FAQ) or Questions and Answers (Q&A), are listed questions and answers, all supposed to be commonly asked in some context
en.FAQ_04: A platform started on the Stellar blockchain, meant for international money transfer, through a currency of the same name. The Migrantcoin platform applies especially to the immigrants who want to send money toward a recipient in their country of origin.
en.FAQ_05: Why is the Migrantcoin project unique?
en.FAQ_07: - The guarantee of the amount in the case where the transaction is reversible.
en.FAQ_08: - The money which is sent reaches directly the recipient’s address.
en.FAQ_09: - We offer some of the lowest taxes on the market.
en.FAQ_10: What are the benefits of Migrantcoin for customers?
en.FAQ_11: - They can send money with just a few clicks
en.FAQ_12: - Money which is sent reaches the receiver’s door.
en.FAQ_13: - The money transfer is a matter of seconds.
en.FAQ_14: - Bonuses for those who achieve a specific amount/value of the transactions.
en.FAQ_15: Does Migrantcoin have a legal entity for its business?
en.FAQ_16: Yes. Migrantcoin Ltd is an active company with the registered office located in Aldershot, Hampshire (UK). It can also be contacted via email at contact@migrantcoin.com.
en.FAQ_17: What problems does Migrantcoin seek to solve?
en.FAQ_18: - The high taxes applied in the case of international money transfers.
en.FAQ_19: - It will simplify the difficult process through which the money dispatched by a sender reaches the recipient. You will be able to send money in just a few clicks.
en.FAQ_20: - It will save a lot of time for customers, both for sender and receiver.
en.FAQ_22: - We are considering other benefits for the holders, but we will disclose all these aspects at the right time.
en.FAQ_24: Migrantcoin platform will operate under the legislation of UK.
en.FAQ_26: First, Migrantcoin will develop its services for Europe, thereafter, with the growth of the business, it will extend worldwide.
en.FOOTER_02: 2 Institute Road Aldershot, Institute Road, Aldershot, GU12 4DA, United Kingdom
en.FOOTER_11: Sign up for updates and market news. Subscribe to our newsletter and receive update about ICOs and crypto tips

ro.TOP_02: Transfer de bani descentralizat bazat pe tehnologia blockchain sustinut de utilizatori.
ro.TOP_03: Posbilitatea de a trimite bani acasa direct din portofelul tau digital, este aici.
ro.HOWITWORKS_02: MAI RAPID CA NICODATA, DIRECT LA USA DESTINATARULUI.
ro.HOWITWORKS_03: Utilizand tehnologia blockchain orin intermediul platformei Stellar, transferurile de bani dureaza acum doar cateva minute si ajung la destinatar in siguranta.
ro.HOWITWORKS_04: Utilizatorul trebuie doar sa se logheze, sa isi alimenteze contul cu suma dorita si sa selecteze modul de transfer.
ro.HOWITWORKS_05: Expeditorul poate sa opteze pentru transferul in contul bancar al destinatarului, livrarea la domiciliu sau ridicarea dintr-un punct de plata PayPoint.
ro.HOWITWORKS_06: Este nevoie doar de cativa pasi simpli:
ro.HOWITWORKS_09: 3. Selecteaza un punct de plata sau un cont bancar (optiunea expeditorului) pentru a achizitiona moneda Migrant.
ro.HOWITWORKS_11: MigrantCoin proceseaza apoi rapid tranzactia si livreaza banii destinatarului in persoana, prin curier.
ro.HOWITWORKS_12: Destinatarul confirma primirea banilor printr-o semnatura electronica.
ro.HOWITWORKS_13: La final, prin intermediul aplicatiei, expeditorul primeste confirmarea livrarii banilor.
ro.MAP_02: Isi petrec in medie 128 de zile din viata deplasandu-se pentru a putea trimite bani rudelor.
ro.VISION_02: Sa cheltuiesti bani e simplu, la fel de simplu ar trebui sa fie si sa ii trimiti.
ro.VISION_03: Urmarind o schimbare in structura sistemului de transfer de bani, noi propunem de asemenea o transformare la nivelul relatiilor interpersonale.
ro.VISION_04: Folosirea pe scara larga a tehnologiei blockchain deschide noi oportunitati pentru a dezvolta comunitati sustenabile.
ro.VISION_05: MigrantCoin este o astfel de oportunitate, un liant intre expeditor si destinatar, cu scopul unic de a simplifica procesul de expediere a banilor.
ro.VISION_06: Cu alte cuvinte, ne propunem sa revolutionam procesul de transfer monetar.
ro.VISION_07: In cele din urma, viitorul apartine celor care sunt capabili sa regandeasca regulile stabilite, care cred ca pot face lucrurile mai bine decat in prezent.
ro.VISION_08: Aceasta este, in esenta, descrierea emigrantilor ce spera si viseaza un viitor mai luminos.
ro.VISION_09: Noi ne vedem mergand mai departe cu aceleasi convingeri, facand astfel MigrantCoin disponibil pentru orice emigrant care doreste sa il foloseasca.
ro.VISION_10: Asta inseamna oportunitatea de a avea acces (care de altfel e dificil) la un sistem de transfer de bani facil pentru utilizator.
ro.TOKEN_02: Un numar prestabilit de token-uri va fi generat pentru vanzare. Dupa acel moment, nu vor mai fi generate alte token-uri.
ro.TOKEN_09: Este de asemenea posibil sa avem un volum static cu un scop de finantare dinamic, in care distribuirea de token-uri se va face in functie de fondurile primite.
ro.ROADMAP_10: Lansarea versiunii 1 a platformei (website and mobil)
ro.ROADMAP_15: Testarea sigurantei prin intermediul unor specialisti independenti
ro.ROADMAP_16: Licenta pentru transfer monetar in Marea Britanie - (6-12 luni)
ro.ROADMAP_17: Serviciul de suport clienti – Call Center
ro.ROADMAP_19: pe langa cele 6 din planul initial.
ro.MISSION_02: Scopul nostru este de a permite emigrantilor sa trimita bani in tarile de origine prin intermediul sistemului blockchain.
ro.MISSION_04: Sa nu uitam ca timpul inseamna bani si nu doar atat.
ro.MISSION_05: Un sistem de transfer de bani descentralizat bazat pe criptomonede va ajuta oamenii sa castige timpul pretios pe care altfel l-ar irosi pe drumuri la cea mai apropiata banca sau cel mai apropiat oficiu de transfer monetar.
ro.MISSION_06: Solutia noastra va permite sa nu fiti nevoiti sa faceti deplasari lungi doar pentru a transfera bani.
ro.MISSION_08: Lumea pe care o imaginam noi ofera utilizatorilor servicii prin care au acces direct si stabil la modalitati de transfer al banilor prin care au garantia ca banii trimisi sunt in siguranta.
ro.MISSION_10: Multa lume primeste bani prin intermedari ocazionali, ceea ce creste riscul de a-i pierde.
ro.MISSION_11: Chiar mai rau, e posibil ca banii sa nici nu ajunga la destinatie.
ro.MISSION_12: MigrantCoin cauta sa elimine aceste riscuri, folosing o structura ce ofera puterea utilizatorilor, permitand astfel detectarea oricarei potentiale erori in procesul de trimitere si primire a unei sume de bani.
ro.VALUES_02: Pentru mai multe detalii, dati click pe fiecare titlu.
ro.VALUES_04: Schimbarea și inovatia sunt necesare dacă vrem să avansăm. Analizand piata de transfer monetar, constatăm că există loc suficient pentru îmbunătățiri.
ro.VALUES_07: Conceptul nostru este dezvoltat atat pentru emigranti, cat si pentru rudele si prietenii pe care acestia ii lasa acasa. Noi avem convingerea ca eforturile noastre pentru imbunatatirea vietii oamenilor va atrage, ca urmare, aprecierea lor. Fara oameni, eforturile noastre nu ar avea sens.
ro.VALUES_10: In urma unei analize meticuloase a pietei de transfer de bani, putem afirma ca optiunile oferite sunt similare . MigrantCoin implementeaza solutii unice pentru problemele pietei si credem cu tarie ca vom face diferenta.
ro.VALUES_13: Principiul nostru este transparenta atat in relatiile cu investitorii, cat si cu comunitatea pe care o consolidam. MigrantCoin isi asuma justificarea fiecarei sume de bani adunate in ICO si vom face tot ce ne sta in putere sa ne respectam angajamentele.
ro.VALUES_14: Identificam nevoile oamenilor si oferim solutii
ro.VALUES_15: Proiectul nostru este, in primul rand, rezultatul dorintei de a solutiona unele din problemele unei categorii anume, emigrantii, si astfel, de a le ameliora traiul de zi cu zi.
ro.VALUES_17: Principalul nostru scop este acela de a garanta siguranta intregii sume de bani incredintate noua de catre client pentru a fi livrata la destinatie. Increderea voastra inseamna succesul nostru- iar noi tindem spre succes.
ro.VALUES_20: Serviciile si sistemele clasice de transfer de bani nu pot tine pasul cu dorinta oamenilor de a evolua constant si rapid. Noi suntem rezultatul unei revolutii tehnologice si este datoria noastra sa oferim viitoarelor generatii instrumentele necesare pentru un transfer de bani rapid si fara riscuri oriunde in lume.
ro.VALUES_22: MigrantCoin isi propune sa fie accesibil pentru orice utilizator oriunde in lume. Acest proces in sine, este unul foarte complex si de durata, pe care noi singuri nu il putem finaliza. De aceea, veti fi multumiti sa aflati ca, in tarile in care ne oferim serviciile, si voi puteti deveni partenerii nostri.
ro.TEAM_01: O echipa puternica cu o experienta diversa
ro.TEAM_02: Echipa noastra extraordinara, este pregatita sa obtina rezultate pe masura.
ro.FAQ_02: Intrebari frecvente (FAQ) sau Raspunsuri si intrebari (Q&A), reprezinta o lista de intrebari si raspunsuri considerate relevante
ro.FAQ_04: O platforma bazata pe blockchain Stellar, utilizata in transferul de bani international, prin intermediul unei monede cu acelasi nume. Platforma Migrantcoin se adreseaza, in esenta, emigrantilor care au nevoie sa trimita bani spre tarile lor de origine.
ro.FAQ_05: De ce este proiectul migrantcoin unic?
ro.FAQ_07: - Garantia returnatii sumei transferate in cazul in care persoana care face transferul se razgandeste.
ro.FAQ_08: - Banii trimisi ajung direct la adresa destinatarului.
ro.FAQ_09: - Percepem unele dintre cele mai mici taxe de pe piata.
ro.FAQ_10: Care sunt beneficiile Migrantcoin pentru clienti?
ro.FAQ_11: - Pot sa trimita bani doar prin cateva clickuri
ro.FAQ_12: - Banii trimisi ajung la usa destinatarului.
ro.FAQ_13: - Transferul de bani se face in cateva secunde.
ro.FAQ_14: - Bonusuri pentru cei care ating un anumit numare de tranzactii.
ro.FAQ_15: Are Migrantcoin o entitate juridica care se ocupa de afacerea sa?
ro.FAQ_16: Da. Migrantcoin Ltd este o companie activa inregistrata in Aldershot, Hampshire (Marea Britanie). De asemenea, poate fi contactata prin email la contact@migrantcoin.com.
ro.FAQ_17: Ce probleme incearca Migrantcoin sa rezolve?
ro.FAQ_18: - Taxele mari percepute la transferurile de bani internationale.
ro.FAQ_19: - Va simplifica procesul anevoios prin care banii trimisi de expeditor ajung la destinatar. Veti reusi sa transferati banii prin doar cateva click-uri.
ro.FAQ_20: - Va castiga mult timp pentru clienti,atat pentru expeditor cat si pentru destinatar.
ro.FAQ_21: -Cum vor avea de castigat detinatorii de Migrantcoin
ro.FAQ_22: - Luam in considerare acordarea de beneficii pentru cei ce detin monede, insa acest aspect va fi elucidat la momentul oportun.
ro.FAQ_23: De ce este Migrant coin in conformitate cu legea?
ro.FAQ_24: Platforma Migrantcoin va functiona in conformitate cu legislatia tarilor in care isi va desfasura activitatea.
ro.FAQ_25: Va fi Migrantcoin disponibil la nivel mondial?
ro.FAQ_26: Initial, MigrantCoin isi va oferi serviciile utilizatorilor din Europa, thereafter, iar pe masura ce se desvolta, se va extinde la nivel global.
ro.FOOTER_02: 2 Institute Road Aldershot, Institute Road, Aldershot, GU12 4DA, United Kingdom
